meanings.definition: Relating to or involving the development of male characteristics
meanings.sent1: The androgenic hormones play a role in the growth of facial hair.
meanings.sent2: The doctor explained that the medication had androgenic effects on the patient.
meanings.sent3: The androgenic influence on his voice made him sound like a deep-voiced cartoon character.
meanings.sent4: His androgenic features were so pronounced that he was often mistaken for a male model.
meanings.sent5: The androgenic changes during puberty can be quite noticeable.

meanings.definition: Having the ability to stimulate the development of male characteristics
meanings.sent1: The androgenic supplements were known to enhance muscle growth in athletes.
meanings.sent2: She was impressed by the androgenic properties of the plant extract.
meanings.sent3: The androgenic effects of the cologne made it popular among men.
meanings.sent4: The androgenic nature of the product led to its success in the market.
meanings.sent5: The androgenic response was evident in the rapid changes observed.
